com.salesmanager.shop.store.controller.customer.facade

Interface CustomerFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerFacadeImpl

    public interface CustomerFacade

    Customer facade working as a bridge between CustomerService and Controller It will take care about interacting with Service API and doing any pre and post processing

    Version:
    1/2
    Author:
    Umesh Awasthi

      • mergeCart

        com.salesmanager.core.model.shoppingcart.ShoppingCart mergeCart(com.salesmanager.core.model.customer.Customer customer,
                                                                java.lang.String sessionShoppingCartId,
                                                                com.salesmanager.core.model.merchant.MerchantStore store,
                                                                com.salesmanager.core.model.reference.language.Language language)
                                                         throws java.lang.Exception

        Method responsible for merging cart during authentication, Method will perform following operations

      • Merge Customer Shopping Cart with Session Cart if any.
      • Convert Customer to CustomerEntity

Parameters:
customer - username of Customer
sessionShoppingCartId - session shopping cart, if user already have few items in Cart.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
